verses.verse: But of the <S%G5550>times<s%> and the <S%G2540>seasons,<s%> <S%G80>brothers,<s%> you <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G3756>no<s%> <S%G5532>need<s%> that I <S%G1125>write<s%> to you.

For <S%G846>yourselves<s%> <S%G1492>know<s%> <S%G199>perfectly<s%> that the <S%G2250>day<s%> of the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G3779>so<s%> <S%G2064>comes<s%> as a <S%G2812>thief<s%> in the <S%G3571>night.<s%>

For <S%G3752>when<s%> they shall <S%G3004>say,<s%> <S%G1515>Peace<s%> and <S%G803>safety;<s%> <S%G5119>then<s%> <S%G160>sudden<s%> <S%G3639>destruction<s%> <S%G2186>comes<s%> on them, as <S%G5604>travail<s%> on a woman with <S%G1722>child;<s%> <S%G106><s%> <S%G2192><s%> and they shall not <S%G1628><s%>escape.
But you, <S%G80>brothers,<s%> are not in <S%G4655>darkness,<s%> that that <S%G2250>day<s%> should <S%G2638>overtake<s%> you as a <S%G2812>thief.<s%>

You are <S%G3956>all<s%> the <S%G5207>children<s%> of <S%G5457>light,<s%> and the <S%G5207>children<s%> of the <S%G2250>day:<s%> we are not of the <S%G3571>night,<s%> <S%G3761>nor<s%> of <S%G4655>darkness.<s%>
<S%G686>Therefore<s%> <S%G3767><s%> let us not <S%G2518>sleep,<s%> as do <S%G3062>others;<s%> but let us <S%G1127>watch<s%> and be <S%G3525>sober.<s%>
For they that <S%G2518>sleep<s%> <S%G2518>sleep<s%> in the <S%G3571>night;<s%> and they that be <S%G3184>drunken<s%> are <S%G3184>drunken<s%> in the <S%G3571>night.<s%>

But let us, who are of the <S%G2250>day,<s%> be <S%G3525>sober,<s%> <S%G1746>putting<s%> <S%G1746>on<s%> the <S%G2382>breastplate<s%> of <S%G4102>faith<s%> and <S%G26>love;<s%> and for an <S%G4030>helmet,<s%> the <S%G1680>hope<s%> of <S%G4991>salvation.<s%>
For <S%G2316>God<s%> has not <S%G5087>appointed<s%> us to <S%G3709>wrath,<s%> but to <S%G4047>obtain<s%> <S%G4991>salvation<s%> by our <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ,<s%>
<S%G3588>Who<s%> <S%G599>died<s%> for us, that, <S%G1535>whether<s%> we <S%G1127>wake<s%> <S%G1535>or<s%> <S%G2518>sleep,<s%> we should <S%G2198>live<s%> <S%G260>together<s%> with him.

<S%G1352>Why<s%> <S%G3870>comfort<s%> <S%G240>yourselves<s%> <S%G240>together,<s%> and <S%G3618>edify<s%> <S%G1520>one<s%> <S%G1520>another,<s%> <S%G2531>even<s%> as <S%G2532>also<s%> you <S%G4160>do.<s%>

And we <S%G2065>beseech<s%> you, <S%G80>brothers,<s%> to <S%G1492>know<s%> them <S%G3588>which<s%> <S%G2872>labor<s%> <S%G1722>among<s%> you, and are <S%G4291>over<s%> you in the <S%G2962>Lord,<s%> and <S%G3560>admonish<s%> you;

And to <S%G2233>esteem<s%> them <S%G5228>very<s%> <S%G1537>highly<s%> <S%G4053><s%> in <S%G26>love<s%> for their <S%G2041>work's<s%> sake. And be <S%G1722>at<s%> <S%G1518>peace<s%> <S%G1722>among<s%> <S%G1438>yourselves.<s%>

<S%G1161>Now<s%> we <S%G3870>exhort<s%> you, <S%G80>brothers,<s%> <S%G3560>warn<s%> them that are <S%G813>unruly,<s%> <S%G3888>comfort<s%> the <S%G3642>feebleminded,<s%> <S%G472>support<s%> the <S%G772>weak,<s%> be <S%G3114>patient<s%> <S%G4314>toward<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> men.

<S%G3708>See<s%> that <S%G3361>none<s%> <S%G5100><s%> <S%G591>render<s%> <S%G2556>evil<s%> for <S%G2556>evil<s%> to <S%G5100>any<s%> man; but <S%G3842>ever<s%> <S%G1377>follow<s%> that <S%G3588>which<s%> is <S%G18>good,<s%> <S%G2532>both<s%> <S%G1519>among<s%> <S%G1438>yourselves,<s%> and to <S%G3956>all<s%> men.
<S%G5463>Rejoice<s%> ever <S%G3842>more.<s%>
<S%G4336>Pray<s%> <S%G89>without<s%> <S%G89>ceasing.<s%>
In <S%G3956>every<s%> thing give <S%G2168>thanks:<s%> for <S%G5124>this<s%> is the <S%G2307>will<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> in <S%G5547>Christ<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G1519>concerning<s%> you.
<S%G4570>Quench<s%> not the <S%G4151>Spirit.<s%>
<S%G1848>Despise<s%> not <S%G4394>prophesyings.<s%>
<S%G1381>Prove<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> things; <S%G2722>hold<s%> <S%G2722>fast<s%> that <S%G3588>which<s%> is <S%G2570>good.<s%>
<S%G567>Abstain<s%> from <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G1491>appearance<s%> of <S%G4190>evil.<s%>

And the <S%G846>very<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> of <S%G1515>peace<s%> <S%G37>sanctify<s%> you <S%G3651>wholly;<s%> and I pray God <S%G3588>your<s%> <S%G3648>whole<s%> <S%G4151>spirit<s%> and <S%G5590>soul<s%> and <S%G4983>body<s%> be <S%G5083>preserved<s%> <S%G274>blameless<s%> to the <S%G3952>coming<s%> of our <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ.<s%>
<S%G4103>Faithful<s%> is he that <S%G2564>calls<s%> you, <S%G3739>who<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> will <S%G4160>do<s%> it.
<S%G80>Brothers,<s%> <S%G4336>pray<s%> for us.
<S%G782>Greet<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> the <S%G80>brothers<s%> with an <S%G40>holy<s%> <S%G5370>kiss.<s%>
I <S%G3726>charge<s%> you by the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> that <S%G3588>this<s%> <S%G1992>letter<s%> be <S%G314>read<s%> to <S%G3956>all<s%> the <S%G40>holy<s%> <S%G80>brothers.<s%>
The <S%G5485>grace<s%> of our <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%> be with you. <S%G281>Amen.<s%> The first epistle to the Thessalonians was written from Athens.
